mapper.select: SELECT t.uno, t.teacher_phone, t.teacher_email, t.teacher_available_time, t.teacher_content, u.name, u.profileimg FROM teacher t JOIN users u ON t.uno = u.uno WHERE t.uno = #{uno}
select count(*) from teacher where uno = #{uno}
